sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { MapPin, Clock, DollarSign, Building, Users, Globe, Heart, Share2, ArrowLeft } from 'lucide-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const JobDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [isSaved, setIsSaved] = useState(false); // Mock job data const job = { id: id, title: 'Senior Full Stack Engineer', company: 'TechCorp', location: 'San Francisco, CA', type: 'Full-time', salary: '$120,000 - $180,000', experience: '3-5 years', posted: '2 days ago', applications: 24, description: `We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Engineer to join our growing team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining our web applications, working with both frontend and backend technologies. As a Senior Full Stack Engineer, you will: - Design and implement scalable web applications - Work with modern frontend frameworks (React, Vue.js) - Develop RESTful APIs and microservices - Collaborate with cross-functional teams - Mentor junior developers - Participate in code reviews and technical discussions`, requirements: [ '5+ years of experience in full-stack development', 'Proficiency in JavaScript, Python, and SQL', 'Experience with React, Node.js, and Django', 'Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)', 'Strong problem-solving and communication skills', 'Experience with agile development methodologies' ], benefits: [ 'Competitive salary and equity', 'Health, dental, and vision insurance', '401(k) matching', 'Flexible work hours and remote options', 'Professional development budget', 'Unlimited PTO', 'Free lunch and snacks', 'Gym membership reimbursement' ], companyInfo: { size: '50-100 employees', industry: 'Technology', founded: '2018', description: 'TechCorp is a leading technology company focused on building innovative solutions for businesses worldwide.', website: 'https://techcorp.com' } }; return (
{/* Back Button */} Back to Jobs {/* Job Header */}

{job.title}

{job.company}

{job.location}
{job.type}
{job.salary}
Posted {job.posted} • {job.applications} applications
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Job Description */}

Job Description

{job.description.split('\n').map((paragraph, index) => (

{paragraph}

))}
{/* Requirements */}

Requirements

    {job.requirements.map((requirement, index) => (
  • {requirement}
    • ))}
{/* Benefits */}

Benefits

    {job.benefits.map((benefit, index) => (
  • {benefit}
    • ))}
{/* Sidebar */}
{/* Company Info */}

About {job.company}

{job.companyInfo.description}

{job.companyInfo.size}
{job.companyInfo.industry}
Visit Website
{/* Similar Jobs */}

Similar Jobs

Frontend Developer

StartupXYZ

San Francisco, CA

Backend Engineer

InnovateLab

Remote

DevOps Engineer

TechCorp

New York, NY

); }; export default JobDetail;
